attributes.action: hold Haringey Social Services/Council to account over "Baby P"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the horrific details of Baby P's injuries, a repeat of the failings of Haringey's Social Services, I call on No.10 to ensure that they are held to account.  They have had their time to 'learn lessons' and must now be held accountable for their gross negligence of this poor child.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
